title: Cartoon Snowflakes Pack
longDescription:
Enjoy the dynamic and action animation template, which includes a unique collection of Cartoon Snowflakes! 

This package contains 18 Cartoon Snowflakes sprite sheet animations for 2D Games.

         

Features:

● Sprite animations work much better than any other shaders and particles due to

memory capacity.

● Optimized for games.

● Pivot point set properly.

● No setup or plug-ins required.

● All materials, sprites and other parts of pack properly named.
technicalDetails:
Video:

https://youtu.be/nfUxHe9VLiI


Technical details:

● File Formats: transparent Png.

● Each frame dimension is 512*288 px.

● 30 FPS


Texture Resolutions:


● Snowflake 01 2560 × 2016

● Snowflake 02 2560 × 2016

● Snowflake 03 2560 × 2016

● Snowflake 04 2560 × 2016

● Snowflake 05 2560 × 2016

● Snowflake 06 3072 × 2016

● Snowflake 07 3072 × 2016

● Snowflake 08 3072 × 2016

● Snowflake 09 5632 × 3456

● Snowflake 10 5632 × 3456

● Snowflake 11 5632 × 3456

● Snowflake 12 3584 × 2592

● Snowflake 13 3584 × 2592

● Snowflake 14 3584 × 2592

● Snowflake 15 7680 × 4608

● Snowflake 16 7680 × 4608

● Snowflake 17 7168x4608

● Snowflake 18 7168x4608


Number of Textures: 18

Supported Development Platforms:

Windows: (Yes)
